SELECT -- course tc.course_id AS courseId, tc.title AS title, tc.main_image AS mainImage, tc.lesson_form AS lessonForm, tc.difficulty AS difficulty, tc.location AS location, tc.type AS type,
-- session ts.session_id AS sessionId, ts.session_no AS sessionNo, ts.session_date AS sessionDate, ts.start_time AS startTime, ts.end_time AS endTime, ts.status AS sessionStatus,
-- application tca.status AS applicationStatus
FROM training_course_application tca JOIN training_session ts ON tca.session_id = ts.session_id AND ts.is_deleted = 0 JOIN training_course tc ON ts.course_id = tc.course_id AND tc.is_deleted = 0 JOIN dog d ON tca.dog_id = d.dog_id AND d.is_deleted = 0
WHERE d.user_id = #{userId} AND tca.is_deleted = 0 AND ts.status = #{sessionStatus}
ORDER BY ts.session_date ASC, ts.start_time ASC
ORDER BY ts.session_date DESC, ts.start_time DESC
